A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I enjoyed the space battles and nearly loved that last fight\, but no such luck.  I am a huge fan of star wars\, especially the original novels and the prequels were alright.  They have deliberately ripped pieces of the novels story out to create a worse story with blatant reverse sexism and plot convenience.  No doubt porgs and chewbacca rocked.  Seeing yoda was also a nice touch.  This Luke though was not the luke that should have been put forward.  He learns and evolves\, but he never abandons his friends in self exhile. I can only recommend renting this if at all and never buying a ticket or buying a copy.
